notes: [Improved] The plugin is now using Facebook API v2.8
[Fixed] Fixed CSS for the Insights widget
[Added] Added an `apiVersion` config to customize the Graph API version used to perform requests to the Facebook API
[Improved] The plugin is now using Graph API 2.7
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Facebook_PluginService::checkRequirements() which was checking if Google was configured instead of Facebook
